ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_1z | |- 1 e. ZZ |
| 2 |  | #P_gcdaddm | |- ( ( 1 e. ZZ /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M gcd N ) = ( M gcd ( N + ( 1 x. M ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M gcd N ) = ( M gcd ( N + ( 1 x. M ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_mulid2 | |- ( M e. CC -> ( 1 x. M ) = M ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( M e. CC -> ( N + ( 1 x. M ) ) = ( N + M ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( M e. CC -> ( M gcd ( N + ( 1 x. M ) ) ) = ( M gcd ( N + M ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( M e. ZZ -> ( M gcd ( N + ( 1 x. M ) ) ) = ( M gcd ( N + M ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M gcd ( N + ( 1 x. M ) ) ) = ( M gcd ( N + M ) ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M gcd N ) = ( M gcd ( N + M ) ) ) |
